links.title: Alphabet Won't Be Enough
links.description: Alphabet Won't Be Enough Bad markets don't scare you out, they wear you out. We had a good example of that today as the indices dripped lower and there was little interest in buying. This wasn't a rush for the exits it was exhibition of disgust and dismay and very little worked for the bulls.
